guide.conclusion:
Download the .pdf or visit my blog at http://lapatisseriedesidees.blogspot.com... to see the step by step instructions to make The Sewer Protector.

You can also download the pattern here!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
And here it is...

My first tutorial ever, and also the very first bag I've ever made.

I've done this bag to carry and keep my new sewing machine (La Balena) protected.

You can make it for your own sewing machine, or just to use it as a regular bag.

Since it is my first tutorial, forgive me if I don't get to explain myself as good as I should. If you have any comments or advice on how to improve my future tutorials, I'll be happy to receive them.

Tools

  • Printer

guide.summary: Assemble a bag for your sewing machine case, or use it for whatever you'd like.
guide.title: The Sewer Protector
